Value.label: Trigger Delay
Value.Help: Set the delay time for turning associated devices OFF based on status change of your Contact Sensor, in seconds. 0 is default, which is instant.

Value.label: Trigger Action
Value.Help: You can choose if your Contact Sensor turns an associated device on or off when sending the basic command set. Value of 0 will set the associated device OFF and value 255 to turn it on. Value between 1 and 99 will be a percentage of light. Value between 100-254 are invalid.
